desc: Dalmazio Design is a small business in Brooklyn specialized in custom-made event & invitation design, home décor & fine gifts.

layout.text: With over 40 years of experience in the event space, you can be sure that Dalmazio Design will help you to curate the perfect moment. From event and invitation design to planning and production, from name brand home decor and personalized gifts to gift registries--we offer an array of services that suit your needs.
